mapper.select: SELECT rest.restaurant_name, rest.restaurant_type, rest.restaurant_address, rest.restaurant_img, res.reservation_reg_date, res.reservation_per, rv.review_score, rv.review_content, res.reservation_id FROM reservations res JOIN restaurants rest ON res.restaurant_id = rest.restaurant_id JOIN reviews rv ON rv.reservation_id = res.reservation_id WHERE res.member_id = #{user_id} AND rv.review_status != 0 ORDER BY res.reservation_reg_date DESC
mapper.delete: UPDATE REVIEWS SET REVIEW_STATUS = 0 WHERE RESERVATION_ID = #{reservation_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWS values( #{reservation_id}, sysdate, #{review_score}, sysdate, sysdate, #{review_content}, 1, #{fullPath} )
